name: Circles
description: I chose to create an art piece inspired by the artist Tyler Hobbs. The ides a was to create different circles in different layers in different sizes.

name: Bubbles
description: This is a variation of the first project in the shape of bubbules, different sizes and colors.

name: Moving Bubbles
description: The third project is a moving variation of the bubbles to imitate underwater bubbles.

name: Circles circles circles
description: This is a recreation of the flowers. I have changed it to circles in different sizes and colours.

name: Moving circles
description: This is a variation of the circles, I added a random color making them move and change colors.

name: Circles and Thorns
description: Here i added a rectangle instead of an ellipse giving it a spike effect implementing a thorn effect.

name: Lines
description: This is an inspired Tyler Hobbs art where I used lines with different colors and used the flow field effect.

name: More lines
description: This version is another variation of the previous art where I also played around with the code changing different numbers and velocity and acceleration creating a whole new image.

name: Dots
description: This project is again inspired by Tyler Hobbs. I used my previous example as an inspiration and changed it to create something new. I used Vectors like accelerations, velocity and position to make one of the balls moving up and side and sidweays but also creating different lines when it moves, giving a whole different art piece.

name: Moving Lines
description: Here I played around with sound on my already existing project with the lines. I used the envelope tone.
